instructions.name: add_mint
docs: - `mint_model`: An instance of `MintModel` containing the metadata for the new mint.

instructions.name: burn_tokens
docs: Burns a specified amount of tokens for the given mint.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to burn tokens for.
- `amount`: The amount of tokens to burn.

instructions.name: close_mint
docs: Closes a mint and releases its resources.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to be closed.

instructions.name: close_state
docs: Closes a state account and releases its resources.

instructions.name: close_token_accounts
docs: Closes token accounts owned by the vault.

instructions.name: drift_cancel_orders
docs: - `market_type`: The type of market (spot or perp) to cancel orders for.
- `market_index`: The index of the market to cancel orders for.
- `direction`: The direction of orders to cancel (long or short).

instructions.name: drift_cancel_orders_by_ids
docs: Cancels drift orders by order IDs.

instructions.name: drift_deposit
docs: - `market_index`: Index of the drift spot market.

instructions.name: drift_initialize
docs: Initializes a drift account owned by vault and creates a subaccount.

instructions.name: drift_place_orders
docs: - Additional permission Permission::DriftSpotMarket or Permission::DriftPerpMarket is required depending on market type.

instructions.name: drift_update_user_delegate
docs: Sets a delegate on the specified sub account.

instructions.name: drift_update_user_margin_trading_enabled
docs: - `margin_trading_enabled`: Whether to enable or disable margin trading.

instructions.name: drift_withdraw
docs: - `market_index`: Index of the drift spot market.

instructions.name: force_transfer_tokens
docs: Forcefully transfers a specified amount of tokens from one account to another.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to transfer tokens for.
- `amount`: The amount of tokens to transfer.

instructions.name: increase_locked_amount
docs: Increases the locked amount (aka stakes JUP).
- `amount`: The amount of JUP to stake.

instructions.name: initialize_and_delegate_stake
docs: Initializes a stake account and delegates it to a validator.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to initialize the stake account with.

instructions.name: initialize_state
docs: Initializes a state account from the provided StateModel instance.
- `state`: An instance of `StateModel` containing the details of the state to be initialized.

instructions.name: jupiter_swap
docs: - `amount`: The amount of input asset to swap.
- `data`: The serialized Jupiter route data containing swap instructions and parameters.
- Permission::JupiterSwapAllowlisted: input and output are in the assets allowlist.
- Permission::JupiterSwapLst: input and output assets are both LST.

accounts.name: output_signer_ata
docs: TODO: Do we really need output_signer_ata?

instructions.name: marinade_claim_tickets
docs: Claims tickets that were unstaked in the previous epoch to get SOL.

instructions.name: marinade_delayed_unstake
docs: Unstakes mSOL to get a ticket that can be claimed at the next epoch.

instructions.name: marinade_deposit_sol
docs: - `lamports`: The amount of SOL to deposit.

instructions.name: marinade_deposit_stake
docs: Deposits a stake account to get mSOL.

instructions.name: marinade_liquid_unstake
docs: Unstakes mSOL to get SOL immediately.

instructions.name: mint_tokens
docs: Mints a specified amount of tokens for the given mint.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to mint tokens for.
- `amount`: The amount of tokens to mint.

instructions.name: open_partial_unstaking
docs: - `amount`: The amount of JUP to partially unstake.
- `memo`: The memo for the partial unstaking.

instructions.name: redeem
docs: Redeems a specified amount of shares.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to redeem.
- `skip_state`: Should always be true (state check to be implemented).

instructions.name: redelegate_stake
docs: Redelegates an existing stake account to a new validator (a new stake account will be created).

instructions.name: set_subscribe_redeem_enabled
docs: Enables or disables the subscribe and redeem functionality.
This allows the owner to pause/unpause subscription and redemption of a fund.
- `enabled`: A boolean indicating whether to enable or disable the subscribe and redeem functionality.

instructions.name: set_token_accounts_states
docs: Sets the frozen state of the token accounts for the specified mint.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to set the frozen state for.

instructions.name: split_stake_account
docs: Splits from an existing stake account to get a new stake account.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to split.

instructions.name: stake_pool_deposit_sol
docs: Deposits SOL to a stake pool to get pool token.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to deposit.
- Integration::SplStakePool or Integration::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_deposit_stake
docs: Deposits a stake account to a stake pool to get pool token.
- Integration::SplStakePool or Integration::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_withdraw_sol
docs: Unstakes from pool token to get SOL immediately.
- `pool_token_amount`: Amount of pool token to unstake.
- Integration::SplStakePool or Integration::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_withdraw_stake
docs: Unstakes from pool token into a stake account.
- `pool_token_amount`: Amount of pool token to unstake.
- Integration::SplStakePool or Integration::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: subscribe
docs: Subscribes to a specified amount of shares.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to subscribe.
- `skip_state`: Should always be true (state check to be implemented).

instructions.name: update_mint
docs: Updates an existing mint with new metadata.
- `mint_id`: The id of the mint to be updated.
- `mint_model`: An instance of `MintModel` containing the updated metadata for the new mint.

instructions.name: update_state
docs: Updates an existing state account with new parameters.
- `state`: An instance of `StateModel` containing the updated details of the state.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw asset from vault into owner's wallet.

instructions.name: wsol_unwrap
docs: Unwraps all wSOL to get SOL.

instructions.name: wsol_wrap
docs: - `lamports`: The amount of SOL to wrap.

errors.name: CloseNotEmptyError
errors.msg: Error closing state account: not empty

errors.name: ShareClassesNotClosed
errors.msg: Glam state account can't be closed. Close share classes first

errors.name: InvalidShareClass
errors.msg: Share class not allowed to subscribe

errors.name: InvalidRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: Invalid accounts: the transaction is malformed

errors.name: ShareClassNotEmpty
errors.msg: Share class mint supply not zero

errors.name: WithdrawDenied
errors.msg: Withdraw denied. Only vaults allow withdraws (funds and mints don't)

errors.name: InvalidStableCoinPriceForSubscribe
errors.msg: Subscription not allowed: invalid stable coin price

errors.name: SubscribeRedeemDisable
errors.msg: Fund is disabled for subscription and redemption
